QuestData.Title: Weed War
QuestData.Description: You want some hops? I've got plenty in the shed out back. I'll gladly share some with you... if you'll help me weed my field.$b$bNow "hop" to it! Get it?
QuestData.LogDescription: Pull 100 weeds from Gai Lan's field.$b$bYou can pull weeds while mounted.
